name: Alamo
description:
This is a very small project, that I modified and developed during some months, I don't like the way it was finished, and I left it.

Here I put the last build.

The story is that, in the future, the world is governed by robots and rubbish, the principal player is the last tree alive and they are about to cut him down when he gets up, comes to life, and start to rebuild the world.

In this version you can build, attack, buy weapons and clean up the area!

Any feedback helps me because I will possibly develop more in holiday time.
